[File: aptos-core/peer-monitoring-service/client/src/peer_states/key_value.rs] [Memory: State accumulation] Can monitoring state accumulate unboundedly if peers are added but never removed, causing memory exhaustion over time? (High)

[File: aptos-core/peer-monitoring-service/client/src/peer_states/key_value.rs] [Resource: Request tracker leak] Can RequestTracker Arc references leak if peer states are not properly cleaned up on disconnection, causing unbounded Arc reference count growth? (Medium)
